item.title: About Jorja Fox's Career
item.description: What movies and TV shows has she been in? Jorja Fox most recently starred in the CBS drama CSI. For a complete list, please check her filmography. What was her first role? She first played the Rooster, in a children production of Chicken Little. Her first professional role was as Myra Pavlov in The Kill-Off. Why did Jorja Fox leave ER? Since she wasn’t a main cast member, Jorja Fox had the freedom to film a pilot for a UPN series, The True Story.
